posts.message:
[align=center]
[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-orange.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition One[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Hack Forum News is back with a new team and a brand new mission, too keep you in the loop and to keep you up to date on the latest news on site and around the world. If you have never heard of Hack Forum News, dont worry we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journilists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and now even around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=121196]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299355][color=#ffffff]HackForums New Theme[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
This week, [mention=1] has been putting in work on HackForums‚Äô new theme, introducing a sleek, modern background and subtle transparency effects throughout the forum. These visual updates bring a fresh, polished feel while maintaining the familiar structure users appreciate. Omniscient has also stated that he plans to continue tweaking the forum‚Äôs design to further evolve its look‚Äîso expect more changes to come.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299750][color=#ffffff]HackForums Official Roadmap[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
[mention=1] has released an official roadmap outlining the many projects he has planned and is actively working towards. With a whopping 69 initiatives on the list, members can expect a wave of updates aimed at revamping and modernizing HackForums. It‚Äôs clear that big things are on the horizon.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299640][color=#ffffff]Harrassment Policy Changes[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
[mention=1] has made the decision to remove the long-standing harassment policy between members. He explained that enforcing the rule was time-consuming and added unnecessary strain to his workload. More importantly, he believes the community is made up of adults who shouldn't require constant moderation. Surprisingly, since the policy‚Äôs removal, member interactions have remained relatively tame and respectful.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299924][color=#ffffff]Convo Harrassment & DOXing[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
Following the removal of the harassment policy from the forum, [mention=1] has made an official announcement extending the same approach to Convo, where much of the personal back-and-forth typically occurs. He stated that Convo is not intended to serve as a permanent log of communication, and as such, he will no longer be enforcing rules against the posting of personal information within it. While this decision aligns with his broader shift toward a more hands-off, self-regulating community, it has sparked mixed reactions. Some members feel this move crosses a line and opens the door to potential abuse. What are your thoughts on this direction?

[hr]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/gaming-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=811]

[color=#72FF84][b][u]Notable console releases (June 2025)[/u][/b][/color]
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/dPaZftT.png[/img][/spoiler]Nintendo Switch 2 - Release date [b]June 6, 2025[/b]
The Nintendo Switch 2 has finally arrived, eight years after the OG launched in March 2017.

Nintendo sold over 3.5 million Switch 2's in its first four days, Nintendo‚Äôs fastest-ever hardware launch.

Large retailers are struggling to keep stock to sell to the public. If you're interested in getting a Switch 2 look for online major retailers. Best Buy, Walmart, Target, GameStop, Newegg, Sam's Club, Antonline, BJ‚Äôs, and Amazon. Users in the UK can also check for periodic restocks at EE.

If you are struggling with getting your hands on the Switch 2, don't worry. Another exciting option is just around the corner. Sit back patiently for this holiday season on the speculated release of the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally. With specs rumored to rival many desktops and laptops, this could be a literal game changer for the industry of handheld gaming. We will touch up more on the subject of this powerhouse in a later edition.

[color=#72FF84][u][b]Notable Game Releases (June 2025)[/b][/u][/color]
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/uzye6FI.png[/img][/spoiler] Mario Kart World (Switch 2)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/3BmcsIv.png[/img][/spoiler] Death Stranding 2: On the Beach (PS5)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/dpsHNmP.png[/img][/spoiler]Five Nights at Freddy‚Äôs: Secret of the Mimic (PC and PlayStation 5)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/v46m7o4.png[/img][/spoiler]The Alters (PC)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/tB49qUP.png[/img][/spoiler]FBC: Firebreak (PC, Xbox, PlayStation)
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/tapjSJ5.png[/img][/spoiler]Splitgate 2 (PC, Playstation, Xbox

üèÜ [color=#72FF84][u][b]E-Sports[/b][/u][/color]
CS2 BLAST Austin Major: Running from June 3 to 22, featuring 32 top teams battling for prestige and prize money.
League of Legends MSI: Taking place in Vancouver from June 27 to July 12, MSI returns as one of LoL's biggest global events.


[color=#72FF84][b][u]Voice Actor Strike (2024-2025)[/u][/b][/color]
A strike was initiated by (SAG-AFTRA) in July 2024, representing approximately 2,600 performers in voice acting, motion capture, and related roles. Workers were worried that game companies would use AI voice replications to copy their voices or likeness without permission and pay. Actors feared losing work and future opportunity.


On [b]June 11, 2025[/b], the strike was officially suspended after an agreement was reached with major video game publishers.

Important contract terms requested by workers:
[list]
[*]Better wages
[*]Clear guidelines on how AI and performer likenesses can be used in future productions.
[*]Improved health and safety protection
[/list]
This deal marks a [u]significant milestone[/u] for digital performance rights in the gaming industry.

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/vibes-header.png[/img]

[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2890436]

[color=#FF56FF][b][size=20]Good day to all the beautiful members of HackForums![/size][/b][/color]

It's been a while since we've had [b]HFNews[/b] around here, and I'm glad we're back ‚Äî and so are the vibes!

For those who don't know, [b]Vibes[/b] is our initiative to bring positive energy to the community by sharing uplifting messages, inspirational quotes, and motivating videos.

For those more in tune with their spirituality, we‚Äôll also be posting spiritual insights, philosophical reflections, and the occasional weekly horoscope.

In addition, I‚Äôll be sharing wellness tips and showcasing herbs that can help improve your overall quality of life.

[i]My goal is to spread positive vibes throughout the HackForums community, and I hope everyone here has a truly wonderful week![/i]

---

[u][b][size=large]This Week's Wellness Tips[/size][/b][/u]

As we enter into the summer season in the Northern Hemisphere, there's one very important thing for everybody to keep in mind: stay hydrated!

Drink at least 8 glasses (2 liters) of water daily. Proper hydration boosts energy, improves skin, and supports overall bodily functions.

---


[u][b][size=large]Herb of the Week: Moringa (Moringa Oleifera)[/size][/b][/u]

One of my all-time favorite herbs has to be Moringa. Some of its other common names include drumstick tree and miracle tree.

[size=large][b]üåø Moringa Benefits[/b][/size]

[b]1. Nutritional Powerhouse[/b]  
- Rich in [b]Vitamins A, C, E[/b] and [b]B-complex[/b]  
- High in [b]calcium, iron, potassium, magnesium, zinc[/b]  
- Contains [b]complete protein[/b] with all essential amino acids  

[b]2. Energy & Vitality[/b]  
- Boosts energy without caffeine  
- Helps combat fatigue and anemia  

[b]3. Immune Support[/b]  
- Strengthens immune system with [b]vitamins, zinc[/b], and natural antimicrobials  

[b]4. Antioxidant & Anti-inflammatory[/b]  
- Contains [b]quercetin, chlorogenic acid, vitamin C/E[/b]  
- Fights oxidative stress and chronic inflammation  

[b]5. Anti-Cancer Potential[/b]  
- Contains [b]niaziminin, isothiocyanates, quercetin[/b]  
- May inhibit tumor growth and cancer cell development  

[b]6. Heart Health[/b]  
- Lowers cholesterol and supports healthy blood pressure  

[b]7. Blood Sugar Regulation[/b]  
- Improves insulin sensitivity and reduces blood sugar spikes  

[b]8. Brain & Mood Support[/b]  
- Supports memory and mood balance  
- Contains [b]tryptophan[/b] for serotonin production  

[b]9. Hormonal & Reproductive Health[/b]  
- May balance hormones and support lactation  

[b]10. Bone Strength[/b]  
- High calcium and magnesium promote bone health  
- May reduce arthritis symptoms  

[b]11. Liver Detox[/b]  
- Protects and regenerates the liver  
- Helps remove toxins and heavy metals  

[b]12. Skin & Hair Care[/b]  
- Antioxidants support skin health  
- Antibacterial properties help with acne and scalp health  

[b]13. Antibacterial/Antiviral/Antifungal[/b]  
- Fights off [b]E. coli, Salmonella, Candida[/b], and more  

[b]14. Digestive Aid[/b]  
- Aids digestion and soothes ulcers  

[b]Common Forms:[/b]  
[i]Leaf powder, fresh leaves, seeds, oil (Ben oil)[/i]  

[b]‚ö†Ô∏è Caution:[/b]  
- May interfere with blood pressure or blood sugar meds  
- Avoid root/bark during pregnancy  

[i]‚ÄúThe Miracle Tree‚Äù lives up to its name![/i]

---

[u][b][size=large]This is Your Weekly Reminder That YOU MATTER![/size][/b][/u]

Don't let anybody else say otherwise. Your life matters. Though we may face some very difficult challenges in life, don't let that discourage you from enjoying life and being yourself.

Always be you, and don't allow other people's negativity to affect you.

If you ever feel like you need to talk to anybody about anything, feel free to send a convo or PM to me, Pikachu and I will be there to listen to your story.


If you are struggling with anything in your life ‚Äî whether it be depression, suicidal thoughts, acceptance, or anything along those lines ‚Äî here are some resources you may use:



[size=18][b]üåç INTERNATIONAL HOTLINES[/b][/size]

[b]Befrienders Worldwide[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.befrienders.org]https://www.befrienders.org[/url]  

[b]Lifeline International[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.lifelineinternational.org]https://www.lifelineinternational.org[/url]  



[size=18][b]üá∫üá∏ UNITED STATES[/b][/size]

[b]988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline[/b]  
Call or text: [b]988[/b]  
Website: [url=https://988lifeline.org]https://988lifeline.org[/url]  

[b]Crisis Text Line[/b]  
Text [b]HOME[/b] to [b]741741[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.crisistextline.org]https://www.crisistextline.org[/url]  

[b]NAMI (National Alliance on Mental Illness)[/b]  
Phone: 1-800-950-NAMI (6264)  
Website: [url=https://www.nami.org]https://www.nami.org[/url]  

[b]The Trevor Project (LGBTQ+ Youth Crisis)[/b]  
Call: 1-866-488-7386  
Text [b]START[/b] to [b]678678[/b]  
Website: [url=https://www.thetrevorproject.org]https://www.thetrevorproject.org[/url]  

[b]Trans Lifeline[/b]  
Call: 1-877-565-8860  
Website: [url=https://www.translifeline.org]https://www.translifeline.org[/url]  



[size=18][b]üá®üá¶ CANADA[/b][/size]

[b]Talk Suicide Canada[/b]  
Call: 1-833-456-4566  
Text: 45645 (4 PM ‚Äì 12 AM ET)  
Website: [url=https://talksuicide.ca]https://talksuicide.ca[/url]  

[b]Kids Help Phone[/b]  
Call: 1-800-668-6868  
Text [b]CONNECT[/b] to [b]686868[/b]  
Website: [url=https://kidshelpphone.ca]https://kidshelpphone.ca[/url]  

[b]LGBT YouthLine[/b]  
Call: 1-800-268-9688  
Website: [url=https://www.youthline.ca]https://www.youthline.ca[/url]  



[size=18][b]üá¨üáß UNITED KINGDOM[/b][/size]

[b]Samaritans[/b]  
Call: 116 123  
Website: [url=https://www.samaritans.org]https://www.samaritans.org[/url]  

[b]Mind (Mental Health Support)[/b]  
Call: 0300 123 3393  
Website: [url=https://www.mind.org.uk]https://www.mind.org.uk[/url]  

[b]Switchboard LGBT+ Helpline[/b]  
Call: 0300 330 0630  
Website: [url=https://switchboard.lgbt]https://switchboard.lgbt[/url]  



[size=18][b]üá¶üá∫ AUSTRALIA[/b][/size]

[b]Lifeline Australia[/b]  
Call: 13 11 14  
Website: [url=https://www.lifeline.org.au]https://www.lifeline.org.au[/url]  

[b]QLife (LGBTQ+ Support)[/b]  
Call: 1800 184 527  
Website: [url=https://qlife.org.au]https://qlife.org.au[/url]  

[b]Beyond Blue[/b]  
Call: 1300 22 4636  
Website: [url=https://www.beyondblue.org.au]https://www.beyondblue.org.au[/url]  



[size=18][b]üá≥üáø NEW ZEALAND[/b][/size]

[b]Need to Talk? (1737)[/b]  
Call or text: [b]1737[/b]  
Website: [url=https://1737.org.nz]https://1737.org.nz[/url]  

[b]OUTLine NZ (LGBT+ Support)[/b]  
Call: 0800 688 5463  
Website: [url=https://outline.org.nz]https://outline.org.nz[/url]  



[size=18][b]üáÆüá≥ INDIA[/b][/size]

[b]iCall Mental Health Support[/b]  
Call: +91 9152987821  
Website: [url=https://icallhelpline.org]https://icallhelpline.org[/url]  

[b]Vandrevala Foundation Helpline[/b]  
Call: 9999 666 555 or 1860 2662 345  
Website: [url=http://www.vandrevalafoundation.com]http://www.vandrevalafoundation.com[/url]  



[size=18][b]üåà GLOBAL LGBTQ+ SUPPORT[/b][/size]

[b]It Gets Better Project[/b]  
Website: [url=https://itgetsbetter.org]https://itgetsbetter.org[/url]  

[b]ILGA World (International LGBTQ+ Network)[/b]  
Website: [url=https://ilga.org]https://ilga.org[/url]  

---

[i][b]Inspirational quote of the week:[/b][/i]  
"Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can."  
‚Äî Arthur Ashe
